title: The Pefect Pizza Kit
description: Camp Chef's Italia Pizza Kit is put together for the artisan inside you. All of the tools needed for creating perfect artisan pizza in one convenient kit. Kit includes Infrared Cooking Thermometer, Pizza Peel, Pizza Spatula, and Rocking Pizza Cutter. Save money by buying the kit over each piece individually.

asset.title: The Pefect Pizza Kit

The Camp Chef Pizza Kit

Camp Chef's Italia Pizza Kit is put together for the artisan inside you. All of the tools needed for creating perfect artisan pizza in one convenient kit. Kit includes Infrared Cooking Thermometer, Pizza Peel, Pizza Spatula, and Rocking Pizza Cutter. Save money by buying the kit over each piece individually.

asset.author: Camp Chef

transcripts:
[STOVE CLICKS ON]
[MUSIC PLAYING]
Hello this is Jack, with Jack's wood-fired oven. In Star Valley Trout Ranch Resort. Today we're gonna be talking about making pizzas at your house. And you'll find this great kit from Camp Chef. They've though it out real well and we've got some great tools to be able to make these pizzas at your house. For starters, we got the essentially, you gotta have some pills. These are  bamboo pills. Easy to get your pizza in and off into your oven. Next, we've got a spatula. As you're making any kind of pizzas at home you're gonna have to be turning them and you're gonna have to be turning them and this spatula is essential. Next, we have our pizza cutter and the great little cutter works really well and then we got our little infrared thermometer. Temperature control in making your pizzas at home is key. And so a thermometer is definitely key in something you want to have in your tool arsenal at home. And next time you make pizza at your house, remember to always have the right tools and I found his great set from Camp Chef.
